meanings.definition: A device used to hold hot pots or pans.
meanings.sent1: My mom always uses potholders when taking out the baking tray from the oven.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to use potholders when handling the hot pot on the stove.
meanings.sent3: The potholders were like superheroes, protecting my hands from the fiery pots.
meanings.sent4: Her potholders were like trusty sidekicks, always ready to save her from burns.
meanings.sent5: The colorful potholders with cute designs made cooking more fun and safe.

meanings.definition: A cloth or pad used to protect hands from hot surfaces.
meanings.sent1: I grabbed the potholders to lift the scorching pan off the stove.
meanings.sent2: The chef wore potholders to prevent burns while handling the hot dishes.
meanings.sent3: The potholders giggled as they shielded my hands from the sizzling skillet.
meanings.sent4: Her potholders were like magical shields, guarding her hands from the heat.
meanings.sent5: The soft potholders felt like cozy blankets for my hands, keeping them safe from burns.
